articles.author: Matthew Solan
articles.title: Don't waste time (or money) on dietary supplements - Harvard Health
articles.description: Americans spend billions on dietary supplements, but there is little evidence of benefits. While some people may need specific supplements to help with deficiencies, for the average healthy person,...
